metadata.title: CVE-2019-17498 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In libssh2 v1.9.0 and earlier versions, the SSH_MSG_DISCONNECT logic inpacket.c has an integer overflow in a bounds check, enabling an attacker tospecify an arbitrary (out-of-bounds) offset for a subsequent memory read. Acrafted SSH server may be able to disclose sensitive information or cause adenial of service condition on the client system when a user connects tothe server.

criterions.comment: libssh2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
